msContents.summary: Anonymous medical compilation. The text is lacunose and not clearly segmented. It contains texts on diagnosis of pulse and urines, and details on phlebotomy; there are also recipes of composite drugs and remedies with superstitious connotations including spells. Various excerpts have been edited Zipser2 see Ermerins , Jouanna, Ideler, Sudhoff, Zipser2

msItem.note: The text is lacunose and not clearly segmented. These subdivisions are in correspondence with Zipser's partial edition. Zipser3
